covid_news_handling module¶

Handles all the updates to news data from the news API and handles the scheduling for these updates. Also deals with removing deleted articles

covid_news_handling.news_API_request(covid_terms='Covid COVID-19 coronavirus')¶

Makes a request to the news_API using the search terms given, then writes the retrieved data into a file called news_data.json

Parameters:

covid_terms (string): A list of search terms that will be used when requesting data from the API

Returns:

news_articles: A list of dictionaries where each dictionary gives information about a specific article

covid_news_handling.remove_news_article(title: str)¶

Removes a given news article from the json file that stores news articles (news_data.json) and writes the deleted article to another json file (deleted_articles.json) so it won’t be included if the news dats is updated

Parameters:

title (string): The title of the news article to be deleted

covid_news_handling.repeat_scheduled_news_update(update_interval: str, update_name: str, scheduled_event)¶

Schedules updates to news API data using an event added to a schedule that is in the global namespace

Parameters:

update_interval (int): A decimal integer that specifies the time in seconds between now and when the update should be scheduled for update_name (string): The name of the update

Returns:
A dictionary consisting of:

event: A scheduled event update_name (string): The name of the update

covid_news_handling.update_news(update_name='', update_interval=1)¶

Schedules updates to news API data using an event added to a schedule that is in the global namespace

Parameters:

update_interval (int): A decimal integer that specifies the time in seconds between now and when the update should be scheduled for update_name (string): The name of the update

Returns:
A dictionary consisting of:

event: A scheduled event update_name (string): The name of the update
